list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor Gantt chart filtering and optimize timeline logic
Separated client-side and server-side filtering for clarity and improved performance. Enhanced client-side filtering functionality to support more granular project and category filters. Fixed error handling and optimized sequence processing, sorting, and cache management in the timeline and categorization workflows.

task.summary:
Add new summarization, filter, and guide features
This update introduces enhanced features, including detailed stats summaries, improved data filters (e.g., by location), and modal popups for detailed information and a guide. It also improves table presentation, sorting, and interactivity while adding clear organization for machine, sequence, and package breakdowns.

Add detailed filters and data enhancements to cutlists
This update introduces new filtering options (e.g., work packages) and significantly refines data display and calculations for cutlists. Enhancements include unit conversions for dimensions, interactive location details, and a user guide for improved usability. The changes aim to streamline material tracking and cutting operations.

Add detailed filters and data enhancements to cutlists
This update introduces new filtering options (e.g., work packages) and significantly refines data display and calculations for cutlists. Enhancements include unit conversions for dimensions, interactive location details, and a user guide for improved usability. The changes aim to streamline material tracking and cutting operations.

Remove unused template files and add modularized configurations
Deleted outdated template files including PHP and CSS related to old database connections and frontend styles. Introduced modularized configurations with `db_config.php`, utility functions for better code maintainability, and a cleaner reusable database connection setup.

Add Production Checkups section and Cutlist Invalidations tool
Introduced a new "Production Checkups" module with dedicated pages and scripts to assist in identifying and resolving production issues. Added a Cutlist Invalidations tool to track and manage invalidated cutlist items, including UI enhancements and dynamic data handling via AJAX. This update improves workflow efficiency and data visibility.

Add Production Checkups and Cutlist Invalidations tools
Introduced a "Production Checkups" module and a Cutlist Invalidations tool to enhance production issue tracking and material management. Updates include new UI features, AJAX-powered dynamic data handling, and improved workflows for better efficiency and visibility.

Add pattern info and improve cutlist invalidations UI
Enhanced the Cutlist Invalidations tool with pattern information display, including job, sequence, lot, and work package details. Implemented AJAX-based dynamic data fetching, updated modal design for larger layouts, and added help documentation integration. Improved utility functions and CSS for better usability and readability.

Update breadcrumb link and adjust cutlist invalidations UI
Fixed breadcrumb navigation to point to the correct file path. Enhanced Cutlist Invalidations UI with improved pattern information display, updated AJAX-based data handling, and better usability through refined modal designs and utility functions.

Add Workweeks module with AJAX endpoints and documentation
Implemented new Workweeks module with endpoints for nested, cut, and kit data retrieval using AJAX. Added detailed module documentation, UI components for filters, summaries, and tables, and optimized data handling with batch processing and pagination. Updated project configuration and utility classes for seamless integration.

Refactor and enhance workweeks module for data reliability
Introduced validations, fallback mechanisms, and enhanced logging to address missing or invalid data in workweek properties like `TotalEstimatedManHours` and `Stations`. Improved performance with efficient batching while ensuring accurate calculations for station hours, weights, and completions. Updated documentation, UI, and debugging tools to streamline development and troubleshooting.

Refactor workweeks module and improve reliability
Updated documentation and SQL queries to enhance clarity. Improved UI styling and responsiveness with new CSS, added help functionality, and optimized data loading with caching and batching. Introduced validations, fallback mechanisms, and export-to-CSV support for better usability and troubleshooting.

Add Gantt chart functionality with new endpoints and UI
Implemented core features for a Gantt chart, including a dynamic AJAX endpoint for categorization status. Introduced associated frontend elements and utility scripts to handle data filtering, visualization, and user interactions. Enhanced project structure with organized modules for streamlined maintenance and scalability.

Add theme support for Gantt chart
Introduced CSS variables and new stylesheets to enable light and dark themes for the Gantt chart UI. Implemented a JavaScript module to handle theme switching with persistence using localStorage, and updated HTML structure to support theme toggling.

Add theme support for Gantt chart
Introduced CSS variables and new stylesheets to enable light and dark themes for the Gantt chart UI. Implemented a JavaScript module to handle theme switching with persistence using localStorage, and updated HTML structure to support theme toggling.

Refactor filtering and enhance Gantt chart responsiveness
Refactored filtering logic to handle project and category filters independently with improved UI updates. Centralized width adjustments for Gantt chart elements, ensuring full container usage and responsiveness on window resize or data reload. Removed redundant inline scripts, cleaning up the index.php file.

Refactor Gantt chart filtering and enhance responsiveness
Refactored project and category filtering logic for better independence and UI updates. Improved Gantt chart responsiveness by centralizing width adjustments and ensuring proper rendering on resize or data reload. Enhanced visuals and functionality with sorting, new CSS updates, and optimizations in inline scripts.

Refactor Gantt chart filtering and optimize timeline logic
Separated client-side and server-side filtering for clarity and improved performance. Enhanced client-side filtering functionality to support more granular project and category filters. Fixed error handling and optimized sequence processing, sorting, and cache management in the timeline and categorization workflows.
